etymology.description: phono-semantic: 麻(麻) (má, 'hemp') phonetic + 其(其) (qí, 'his') semantic = military signal flag -> 麾
etymology.interpretation: The character combines the phonetic component 麻(麻) (má, 'hemp'), which suggests the pronunciation, with the semantic component 其(其) (qí, 'his'), signifying possession or direction, to denote a flag used in military contexts. The hemp suggests the material, while the overall structure conveys the concept of a flag or signal.
